Methods

PasswordEquals(string?)

Checks if decrypted Password is equal to password

bool PasswordEquals(string? password)

Parameters

password string

Value compared with decrypted Password value.

Returns

bool

true if password and decrypted Password have the same value; otherwise, false

See Also
IItem
User

SetPassword(string?)

Sets Password to encrypted password value or null value.

bool SetPassword(string? password)

Parameters

password string

User's decrypted password

Returns

bool

false if Password set to null; otherwise true

Remarks

Password is set to null if password is null, Empty or consists exclusively of white-space characters. Otherwise password is encrypted with th use of Salt value. Password is set to returned value.
